I20051213-0010

1) Using the import wizard>External Plug-ins and Fragments>Click next
2) Set the Import As to "Binary Projects with linked content" and click next
3) Select any package (I used org.eclipse.ui) and click Add,then click Finish
4) You get a Problem Occured dialog with a NPE message.

The following stack trace is found in the error log:

Error 2005-12-13 14:29:47.795 java.lang.NullPointerException
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.plugin.ClasspathComputer.getExecutionEnvironment(ClasspathComputer.java:198)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.plugin.ClasspathComputer.getClasspath(ClasspathComputer.java:63)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.PluginImportOperation.importPlugin(PluginImportOperation.java:232)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.PluginImportOperation.run(PluginImportOperation.java:124)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1714)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1734)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.imports.PluginImportWizard$2.run(PluginImportWizard.java:114)
